examples.example: 今天我做了一件非常有意义的事情，感觉特别开心。

translate.english: Today I did a very meaningful thing and felt extremely happy.

examples.example: 我今天完成了一件很有挑战性的任务，心里特别有成就感。

translate.english: I completed a very challenging task today, and I feel a special sense of accomplishment in my heart.

examples.example: 我拥有一件珍贵的礼物，它让我时刻感到温暖和幸福。

translate.english: I have a precious gift which makes me feel warm and happy all the time.
